ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] bazaar
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, the bazaar is a bit laggy, but I find that if you re working in various windows (trader, bazaar, inventory) look down at the ground or face a wall.
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, the bazaar is a bit laggy, but I find that if you're working in
various windows (trader, bazaar, inventory) look down at the ground or
face a wall. Makes things LOTS faster!!

-- Ariaya
Heart of the Dunedain, Terris-Thule Server
ariaya@...
________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________

Message: 2
Date: Sat, 27 Jul 2002 01:35:06 -0000
From: "mlockridge01" <MLockridge01@...>
Subject: bazaar

Went there this morning to set up some sales. Lag was terrible. It
was hard to even get my cursor on target. I suppose it will be ok
once I get set up to sell, but the set up is terrible. Move cursor.
Not on object. Move a bit more. Not on object. Move back. Click.
Don't have object. Click again. Hmph. Had object but didn't know it,
and just put it back. Click...

Took so long that I didn't finish setting up before I had to log. I
wouldn't have logged if I could have left my toon to do business
while I was gone, but no such luck.

I just gotta get another machine, faster connection, and retire from
my job so that I can play all the time.

Barto Proudfoot
